original: Corporate social responsibility (CSR) has emerged as a critical aspect of business ethics in recent years. It refers to a company's obligation to contribute to sustainable development and act in ways that benefit society at large. This essay will discuss the role of CSR in business ethics and examine its impact on a company's reputation, customer loyalty, and overall financial performance using ex
